title: Krishna Consciousness Is the Highest Rasa! | Soulful Japa
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.text: We all want good experience. We are all living entity means experiential being.
Everybody likes experience, good experience. Good experience is called Rasa.
The whole path of Bhakti as well as the goal of Bhakti, destination of Bhakti
is from Rasa.
The whole school of Rasa is Bhakti Rasa.
For instance, why are we chanting?
Why have we come into Krishna consciousness?
Because even in the knowledge that Krishna is the Supreme Absolute Truth,
there is a knowledge Rasa.
Knowing Rasa.
Apart from that, you know, his attractive nature, God is a reservoir of all love.
And we are his part and parcel.
So there also there is Rasa.
Loving Rasa.
Material world, a world of karma, no freedom, bondage.
We come to Krishna consciousness hoping for freedom Rasa.
We get freedom from these material modes of nature.
Let me experience my true freedom to love Krishna.
So we are all Rasa beings.
And our seeking of Rasa is what
we are seeking in Krishna consciousness also through different ways.
And there is no better understanding of Japa.
Better perception of Japa.
Than thinking that
Japa is giving us an access
to an ocean of Rasa.
Sat Rasa, Chit Rasa and Ananda Rasa.
The ocean of Rasa.
Who does not want it?
We are Rasa beings.
The absolute truth Krishna.
Is a supreme ocean of Rasa.
He is Akila, Rasa, Amrita, Sindhu.
Akila, Rasa, Amrita, Sindhu.
All Rasas.
Sindhu ocean.
Amrita.
Sweet.
Nectarian.
That is why we are all after Krishna consciousness.
Not simply some God who is sitting and ruling everything.
There is a very small aspect.
It is a fact that he is ruling this material world.
There are all very small aspects of Krishna.
You cannot understand the glories of
what the country is.
By understanding
everything that is around.
By trying to understand what goes on in the prison in the country.
In the prison in the country is
very nicely you are running the prison.
You understand who is the superintendent.
Who is the controller.
He is the controller and all this.
It is all dry.
Krishna is the controller of this material world.
All these are dry for Bhaktas.
It is Shanta Rasa.
It is also Rasa.
Shanta Rasa.
Bhakti Rasa is Rasa of active relationship with Krishna.
Dasya, Sakya.
Dasya Rasa.
Dasya Rasa.
Sakya Rasa.
Vatsalya Rasa.
Madhurya Rasa.
Even Shanta Rasa is so wonderful.
For a Rasa starved living entity in this material world.
Even Sakya Rasa.
Even Shanta Rasa.
Where there is no active exchange of relationship.
But there is appreciating Rasa.
Of the greatness of
the Supreme Lord.
His creation.
We need to understand.
We need to always know that we are Rasa beings.
And Krishna Consciousness is the highest Rasa.
Krishna Consciousness is the path for us to experience.
Our highest Rasa is also our original Rasa.
In the material world we run after this Rasa, that Rasa, so many Rasas.
Actually they are all not connected to us.
But Krishna Rasa or Bhakti Rasa is our original Rasa.
And Rasa means Sat Rasa, Chit Rasa, Aarana Rasa.
